embed.description: Follow the steps below to provide us with enough information to help:

fields.name: Plugin and server versions
fields.value: Run `/ess version` either in your console or in-game, then copy and paste the full output of the command or take a screenshot and include it in your support request.

fields.name: Server logs and config files
fields.value:
Don't upload files to Discord! We can't easily open and check these files.

Instead, you should upload the `logs/latest.log` and `plugins/Essentials/config.yml` files to a paste service (like [Gist](https://gist.github.com) or [Hastebin](https://hasteb.in)), then post the link here. 
If you're having trouble with kits, you should also include `kits.yml`.

fields.name: Template
fields.value:
Copy and paste the following template when making your support request:
```markdown
Startup log: <link>
EssentialsX config: <link>

`/ess version` output:
<...>
```
